title: People’s Leasing celebrates 26th Anniversary with valiant fuel station staff
body_lines: People’s Leasing and Finance PLC (PLC), celebrated its 26th Anniversary on 31 May and among initiatives undertaken to mark the milestone were rewarding gasoline pumpers who work tirelessly without regard for their comfort zones delivering 24-hour service to consumers. According to a concept of the Corporate Management of PLC in collaboration with the Branch Managers, randomly chosen owners of fuel stations near PLC Branches countrywide were gifted a token of appreciation on 31 May.
